channel.title: 101 things you can do with a Local Network Connection
channel.description:
Okay, well, I want to see how smart you guys can be when it comes with Network connections. And since I'll be in Networking 2 next school year, Post something you find interesting that can be done on a Local Area Network [b]without internet![/b] And I'll put it here and let's see if we can come up with 101 things. I have one. I think printer sharing is pretty interesting. You can easily set up a network printer even if it's USB. Just hook it up to a computer and then enable it to be shared.
Play a game 1-on-1 with someone on a Local Area Connection.
Log in to a RSPS using localhost.
"Hack yourself"/Keylog yourself.
Use [url=http://www.planet-source-code.com/vb/scripts/ShowCode.asp?txtCodeId=6134&lngWId=3]WinChat[/url] To talk to users across a large LAN.
Now, I challenge you to post something you find interesting!

item.title: 101 things you can do with a Local Network Connection
item.dc:creator: @Maedie1 Maedie1
item.description:
@Maedie1 wrote:

Shouldn’t be too hard. Eh?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:6, topic:279295”]Local Internet Connection without Internet!

Only this site would come up with a topic like this…[/quote]
<3

Maedie1, Its called a LAN Local Area Network and your talking Networking next year…

You can talk over a LAN with WinChat
